currentState.dldescription: Describes the state of an animal, including current location, fate, and fertility status

identity.dldescription: Describes the identity of an animal, including tag identification, location, and herd

lifeData.dldescription: Describes Animal Life attributes that typically do not change over the lifetime of the animal

parentage.dldescription: Describes the parentage of an animal, including parentType, birthDamId, and sireId
